text: Drop Zone is a 1994 American action thriller movie directed by John Badham and starring Wesley Snipes, Yancy Butler, Gary Busey, Malcolm-Jamal Warner, Rex Linn, Mickey Jones, Michael Jeter. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1994 action movies Category:1994 thriller movies Category:American action movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by John Badham Category:Movies about aviation accidents or incidents Category:Movies set in Miami Category:Movies set in Washington, D.C. Category:Movies composed by Hans Zimmer
title: Drop Zone (movie)
